items.name: V²Case
items.description: Modular, scalable, quiet, Mini-PC Case for Desktop Parts with standardized Accessories. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²Accessories
items.description: Standardized Accessories for V²Case: V²Feet, V²Bracket, V²Access, V²Control, V²Color, V²Duino, V²Cooler, V²Parallel. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²PC
items.description: Ready made PC Configurations ranging from Entry Level to High End. Covering custom configurations for Personal Use, Game PC and Workstations. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²Bare
items.description: Ready made Bare Bone Configurations. 3L, 6L and 9L Models. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²Panel
items.description: PC I/O Panel with Remote Power On, 4 USB Ports, Head Set Ports, Arduino compatible MCU for extensive Fan and RGB Lights Control. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²Dock
items.description: Boost your V²PC with a docked GPU or 4 RAID Disks. Data Rates up to 4000 MB/s. Maker Docu: Standards, Blueprints, Development Kits, Developer Stories, User Stories

items.name: V²Configurator
items.description: PC Configurator Web App. Easy to use. Elegant UI. Pick a V²Configuration as your base config and then customize to your needs. Your custom Configuration can be easily shared in Forums, emails, etc to get feedback.

items.name: V² How to DIY Mini PC
items.description: How-to Articles on custom building your own DIY Mini or All-In-One Computer

name: Trailblazer Products
description: V² Standards turned into real Products
